content.text: CSS Grid Columns, Rows and Gaps
Grid Columns
The vertical lines of grid items are called columns .
content.html: The vertical lines of grid items are called columns.

content.text: Grid Rows
The horizontal lines of grid items are called rows .
content.html: The horizontal lines of grid items are called rows.

content.text: Grid Gaps
The spaces between each column/row are called gaps .
content.html: The spaces between each column/row are called gaps.

content.text: You can adjust the gap size by using one of the following properties:
content.html: You can adjust the gap size by using one of the following properties:

content.text: The column-gap Property
The column-gap property specifies the gap between the columns in a grid.
content.html: The column-gap property specifies the gap between the columns in a grid.

content.code_html:
.container {
  display: grid;
  column-gap: 50px;
}

content.text: The row-gap Property
The row-gap property specifies the gap between the rows in a grid.
content.html: The row-gap property specifies the gap between the rows in a grid.

content.code_html:
.container {
  display: grid;
  row-gap: 50px;
}

content.text: The gap Property
The gap property is a shorthand property for row-gap and column-gap :
content.html: The gap property is a shorthand property for row-gap and column-gap:

content.code_html:
.container {
  display: grid;
  gap: 50px 100px;
}

.container {
  display: grid;
  gap: 50px;
}

content.text: Grid Lines
The lines between columns are called column lines .
content.html: The lines between columns are called column lines.

content.text: The lines between rows are called row lines .
content.html: The lines between rows are called row lines.

content.text: We can specify where to start and end a grid item by using the following properties:
content.html: We can specify where to start and end a grid item by using the following properties:

content.text: You can refer to line numbers when placing a grid item in a grid container.
content.html: You can refer to line numbers when placing a grid item in a grid container.

content.text: The grid-column-start and grid-column-end Properties
The grid-column-start property specifies where to start a grid item.
content.html: The grid-column-start property specifies where to start a grid item.

content.text: The grid-column-end property specifies where to end a grid item.
content.html: The grid-column-end property specifies where to end a grid item.

content.code_html:
.item1 {
  grid-column-start: 1;
  grid-column-end: 3;
}

content.text: The grid-column Property
The grid-column property is a shorthand property for the grid-column-start and the grid-column-end properties.
content.html: The grid-column property is a shorthand property for the grid-column-start and the grid-column-end properties.

content.code_html:
.item1 {
  grid-column: 1 / span 2;
}

content.text: The grid-row-start and grid-row-end Property
The grid-row-start property specifies where to start a grid item.
content.html: The grid-row-start property specifies where to start a grid item.

content.text: The grid-row-end property specifies where to end a grid item.
content.html: The grid-row-end property specifies where to end a grid item.

content.code_html:
.item1 {
  grid-row-start: 1;
  grid-row-end: 3;
}

content.text: The grid-row Property
The grid-row property is a shorthand property for the grid-row-start and the grid-row-end properties.
content.html: The grid-row property is a shorthand property for the grid-row-start and the grid-row-end properties.

content.code_html:
.item1 {
  grid-row: 1 / span 2;
}

content.text: All CSS Grid Column, Row and Gap Properties

content.code_html:
Property Description
display Specifies the display behavior (the type of rendering box) of an element
column-gap Specifies the gap between the columns
gap A shorthand property for the row-gap and the column-gap properties
grid-column A shorthand property for the grid-column-start and the grid-column-end properties
grid-column-end Specifies where to end the grid item
grid-column-start Specifies where to start the grid item
grid-row A shorthand property for the grid-row-start and the grid-row-end properties
grid-row-end Specifies where to end the grid item
grid-row-start Specifies where to start the grid item
row-gap Specifies the gap between the grid rows
